Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Scheduler
extends java.util.TimerTask
    The Scheduler class runs a timer as a user completes a lesson, and calculates as well as displays the accuracy, speed, and time on the screen.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mediha Munimm

      This method displays the user's lesson/typing information.

      This method ends the timer.

      This method runs the completeTask method which increases the elapsed time.

        public static int counter()
        This method calculates and returns the (correctly typed) characters per second.
